comment:
Ok these guys also have a relatively poor scoring across the board. Can a society which is either so secret or obscure I've never heard of them, the British Bourbon Society save them?

No they can't.  I detest Loch Lomond but Hunter Laing massaged it into something acceptable. That Boutique Whisky Co. has rescued many an average distillery their bottlings of Glenrothes being way better then the original. These guys fly under the radar for a reason..they aren't good at their day job. 

Baby vomit and cheese on the nose and palate.Thin weak..I can taste rye but that's about it.
